body_html:
@orionr @peterjc123 @ezyang

Ok, now we did a job developing a system that builds shared libs with v140 both in debug/release, cpu/gpu modes with support of python bindings and detectron ops. This is nice, cause as a Windows-based production developers at my workplace we face real pain adapting frameworks to Windows.

If there is any interest in cooperation on the plans describe earlier, this is the dedicated issue.

It was nice working with you. Waiting for whatever updates on this PR.

If there is any interest in cooperation on the plans describe earlier, this is the dedicated issue.
It was nice working with you. Waiting for whatever updates on this PR.
body:
@orionr @peterjc123 @ezyang 

Ok, now we did a job developing a system that builds shared libs with v140 both in debug/release, cpu/gpu modes with support of python bindings and detectron ops. This is nice, cause as a Windows-based production developers at my workplace we face real pain adapting frameworks to Windows.

If there is any interest in cooperation on the plans describe earlier, [this is](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/13896) the dedicated issue.  

It was nice working with you. Waiting for whatever updates on this PR.
